location: James Cook University (Sims Drive Campus) is located at 149 Sims Drive, Singapore 387380. The Beijing Representative Office is located at #2305 Block B, Winterless Center, No.1 Xidawang Rd., Chaoyang District, Beijing, China 100026.
contact_numbers: Sims Drive Campus: Tel: +65 6709 3888, Fax: +65 6709 3889. Beijing Office: Tel: +8610 5351 9266.
main_contact_email: admissions-singapore@jcu.edu.au  (Please address all email enquiries and mail to the Sims Drive Campus.)
arrival_and_greet: For Airport Meet and Greet services, contact:  meetandgreet-singapore@jcu.edu.au
student_affairs: For current students, contact the Student Affairs Centre at:  studentaffairs-singapore@jcu.edu.au
alumni_career: For alumni matters, contact:  alumni-singapore@jcu.edu.au . For career services, contact:  careers-singapore@jcu.edu.au
academic_calendar: The academic calendar and semester timetables are available at https://www.jcu.edu.sg/current-students/calendars-and-timetables
campus_map_transportation:
Campus Maps & Contact Information: We are located at 149 Sims Drive, Singapore 387380. Click here to take a virtual tour of our campus.

Transportation to the campus:

üöá MRT:
- Aljunied MRT (EW9): Approx. 10 min (850m) walk
- Kallang MRT (EW10): Approx. 10 min (860m) walk

üöå Bus Stops:
- Blk 45 (80229): Bus No. 64 and 125 ‚Äî Approx. 4 min (300m) walk
- Yi Xiu Factory Building (80071): Bus No. 2, 13, 21, 26, 51, 62, 63, 67, 80, 100, 158 ‚Äî Approx. 7 min (550m) walk
- Opp Mohammed Salleh Mosque (80069): Same buses as above ‚Äî Approx. 9 min (730m) walk
reporting_verification: All students must attend the Reporting and Verification session. Please arrive 10 minutes early and bring all original documents submitted during application. Required documents: Signed Advisory Note, Letter of Offer, Student Contract, Passport/NRIC, ICA Card, Birth Certificate (for international students), Academic Transcripts, Proof of English Proficiency, Name Change Deed Poll, etc.
preparation_for_study: Before Orientation Week, students should prepare for living in Singapore, medical check-ups, Student Pass, Student ID card collection, email setup via JCU GetStarted, and access eStudent for enrolment and timetable details. LearnJCU is the online learning platform. For digital readiness, ensure minimum system requirements are met.
timetable_and_enrolment: Log into StudentFirst to check your timetable. If clashes occur or you need enrolment help, contact the Academic Planning or Enrolments Office. Use eStudent > My Study Plan for course details.
campus_and_transport: JCU Singapore is located at 149 Sims Drive, Singapore 387380. Nearest MRT stations: Aljunied (EW9) and Kallang (EW10), approx. 10 mins walk. Bus stops: Blk 45 (80229) ‚Äì Bus 64,125; Yi Xiu Factory (80071) & Opp Mosque (80069) ‚Äì Bus 2,13,21,...158.
email_account: Students must use their official JCU email for all university communications. Set it up on JCU GetStarted using your 8-digit Student ID (found on Student Contract).
student_id_card: Mandatory for campus access, library, exams, and other services. You‚Äôll be notified by Student Affairs via email when ready for collection.
learnjcu_platform: LearnJCU is the main academic platform for accessing teaching materials, communication, assessments, and class info.
digital_readiness: Ensure your device meets the general technical requirements for online/blended learning. Visit the Digital Readiness section on the website.

feedback.note: Use the centralized student feedback portal for suggestions, compliments, or issues.

university_life_highs_lows: Starting university is exciting but can be overwhelming. It's normal to feel anxious during assessments or uncertain at first. You‚Äôre not alone‚Äîconnect with peers, talk about your feelings, and support each other.

admissions_requirements.general: Applicants must have completed 12 years of schooling and achieved English proficiency equivalent to IELTS 6.0 or higher. Pathway programs are available.
admissions_requirements.country_specific: Entry requirements may differ based on the applicant‚Äôs country and chosen course of study. Please refer to the specific course pages for details.
admissions_requirements.contact: For more information, contact your local representatives or email admissions-singapore@jcu.edu.au.
admissions_requirements.location: Admissions Office, 149 Sims Drive, Block A, Singapore 387380
admissions_requirements.opening_hours: 8:30am to 6:00pm, Monday to Friday (Closed on Sat/Sun/Public Holidays)

advanced_standing.eligibility: Students with prior tertiary study may be eligible for exemption from some subjects.
advanced_standing.instructions: Attach transcripts and subject syllabi along with the Advanced Standing Application Form during your application.
advanced_standing.assessment_tool: Visit the Advanced Standing Assessor to view existing arrangements with institutions worldwide.

credit_transfer.policy: Assessment must be completed before enrolment due to the binding nature of the Standard Student Contract.
credit_transfer.note: Once the contract is signed, it cannot be amended. Students must submit supporting documents at the time of application.
credit_transfer.form: Please download the Credit Transfer Form from the official site.

before_starting: Valid email address (used for all application correspondence)
Documents in PDF, DOC, DOCX or JPG format (max 5MB each, named in English)
documents_required: Highest education certificate and transcript (translated if not in English)
English proficiency proof (IELTS/TOEFL/Medium of Instruction letter)
Student Referral Form (if referred by alumni)

steps: Click 'APPLY NOW' on your chosen course page
Provide personal details, citizenship, past education, etc.
Agree to terms and receive your login ID/password via email

application_process: Provide residential and English proficiency status
Provide emergency and agent contact details
Submit application declaration and complete submission
how_to_apply.tracking: Check your application status via eStudent using the login details emailed to you after registration
